# Spring Batch Enterprise Framework

## 실행 방법

```bash
# Gradle 빌드
./gradlew build -x test

# 애플리케이션 실행
./gradlew bootRun
```

## 접속 URL

- API: http://localhost:8080/api
- Swagger: http://localhost:8080/api/swagger-ui.html
- H2 Console: http://localhost:8080/api/h2-console

## 기본 계정

- admin / admin123!
- batch / admin123!
